title: Provides that interest shall not begin to accrue in disputed workers' compensation case until final dispute resolution
summary: Provides that interest shall not begin to accrue until a final determination has been made in cases or controversies commenced or decided pursuant to sections twenty, twenty-three and/or twenty-five of the workers' compensation law.
